cultivation_end.text:
Your cultivation just ended! You have received **{culti_gain}** cultivation.
Use `^stat` to check your new status.
-# If the new cultivation is not correct, this is likely caused by an error. Report it to Bot Admin ASAP.

already_account.text:

already_account.text_TG:
âœ… **Account Already Exists**

{user} You already have an account, please use other commands.
Use `/stat` to check status, or `/help` to check available commands.

xx_commands.text:
## Bot Command List (Prefix: `^`):
### DM Commands:
- `^start` â€”â€” Create account
    Alias: `^begin` | `^ks`
- `^/acc` â€”â€” View account details, or change your in-game name and language, or redeem codes.
### Game Commands:
- `^intro` â€”â€” Get introduction of this Bot.
    Alias: `^js`
- `^cul` â€”â€” Cultivate for 2hr, some commands will be locked.
    Alias: `^sit` | `^xl`
- `^hunt` â€”â€” Go for a hunting, to get copper, cultivation, and low chance for gold.
    Alias: `wild` | `^dy`
- `^asc` â€”â€” Increase your stage level when your cultivation has reached current stage\'s maximum.
    Alias: `^ascend` | `^tp`
- `^stat` â€”â€” View your current status.
    Alias: `^zt`
- `^inv` â€”â€” View your inventory.
    Alias: `^wp`
- `^test` â€”â€” View test details.
    Alias: `^beta` | `^cs`
- `^shop` â€”â€” Purchase items.
    Alias: `^sd`
- `^ele` â€”â€” Check or choose elements.
    Alias: `^element` | `^ys`
- `^exp` â€”â€” Missing textmap
    Alias: `^ts`
- `^challenge` â€”â€” Missing textmap
    Alias: `^tz`
### Other Commands
- `/help` â€”â€” Shows this message.
    Alias: `^help` | `^h` | `^bz`
- `/luck` â€”â€” Missing textmap
- `/lunar` â€”â€” Missing textmap
Current Ver: `{xx_version} (Internal)`
